text: int main ( ) { int t , n , * a , i , cnt ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { cnt = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , a + i ) ; while ( n > 1 ) { if ( * ( a ) > * ( a + 1 ) ) { cnt += * ( a + 1 ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) * ( a + i ) = * ( a + i + 1 ) ; n -- ; } else { cnt += * ( a ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) * ( a ) = * ( a + i + 1 ) ; n -- ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , cnt ) ; } return 0 ; }
